name: Fatherboard
description:
We all know about the Motherboard, but have you ever heard of fatherboard?

Fatherboard is a retro, sci-fi metroidvania about exploring a spaceship you came across on your inter galactic travels.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to move left and right
  • Z to jump
  • X is occasionally used in menus 
  • A to toggle stars (Turning off stars may help decrease lag)

*** In beta testing we had some issues with the html version of fatherboard. If you are having issues, try playing here: https://tic80.com/play?cart=1931

*** The collisions are  made by me, and have some glitches that may make the game hard to play.
